author: Samantha Netkin
title: Michael Jackson's Little Girl Paris Is All Grown Up at the Grammy Awards
text:
Paris Jackson's Balmain Jumpsuit at the 2017 Grammy Awards Michael Jackson's Little Girl Paris Is All Grown Up at the Grammy Awards February 12, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Michael Jackson's Little Girl Paris Is All Grown Up at the Grammy Awards 
Paris Jackson was only 11 years old when her father, music legend Michael Jackson , passed away. Now 18, she's all grown up and making a name for herself in the industry her dad dominated for decades. Paris stepped onto the Grammy Awards red carpet wearing a striped Balmain jumpsuit and heels, an appropriate choice for the occasion. The teen opted for an oil slick WAR by Michael Bradley clutch and Kimberly McDonald jewelry to round out the ensemble. Read on for a closer look at all the details.
